urls.title: La Première - Intercontinental flights | Air France
urls.description: Traveling in First Class with Air France and enjoy the Paris-Charles de Gaulle airport personalized service designed exclusively for you. At Paris-Charles de Gaulle airport, enjoy a peaceful and relaxing break in the La Première lounge. Treat yourself to a tasty snack or enjoy a full meal or cocktail: anything is possible in the La Première lounge... Enjoy the privacy and comfort of an exclusive space : la suite La Première... The Air France travel kit and accessories rated "Best comfort accessories in first class" serve to provide comfort and tranquility throughout your journey. Enjoy with Air France a unique dining experience in First Class, under the sign of pleasure and refinement "à la française".
